alert.note: Alert for Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 21 at 1:10AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN PEARL RIVER COUNTY THROUGH 145 AM CST... At 109 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing funnel clouds 8 miles north of Poplarville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...If a funnel cloud briefly touches down, minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Poplarville and Crossroads. This includes Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 29 and 42. FUNNEL CLOUDS...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
